media:group.media:title: The First Sermon in America
media:group.media:description:
This video looks at the history of the first sermon in America at the Plymouth Colony. The man was Robert Cushman, a deacon, who had come to inspect the investment of the colony. In the end, he preached the first sermon ever in the new colonies.
